documentation.text:
@title RewardStore
 @dev A simple contract that allows users to purchase digital products using MATIC
@dev Constructor that sets the owner of the contract

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Payment amount must be greater than 0"

arguments.value: Payment amount must be greater than 0

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Payment amount must be greater than 0"

documentation.text:
@dev Function to buy a product
 @param productId The ID of the product being purchased

@dev Get contract balance (for testing purposes)
 @return The balance of the contract

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only the owner can perform this action"

arguments.value: Only the owner can perform this action

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only the owner can perform this action"

documentation.text: @dev Modifier that allows only the owner to execute a function

@dev Function to withdraw funds from the contract (emergency use only)
 @param amount The amount to withdraw
